conversations.content: Hm? Who is that...?
Amazing... Incredible! Stupendous!
This castle is absolutely dripping with ancient magic!
It's a treasure trove of past wisdom. I want to— No, I MUST study it from top to bottom!
Excuse me—
Gaaah!
Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
I'm Euden, and this is my castle.
How exactly did you get in here? I don't recall ever seeing you before.
Oh! Well, I, um... You see...
Deep breaths, Althemia. Calm down...
J-just... Just answer the question...
Sorry; did you say something? You're a bit...mumbly.
Oh, I... I was just t-talking. To myself.
Um, you see... Th-this castle, it... It's really...really...old.
Uh, yep. It sure is.
I was told it was built many generations ago. Er, but what does its age have to do with anything?
Uhh, well, because it's old, there's a lot of... Uh, what I mean is... I kind of want to look around and...inspect it?
You want to inspect the castle because it's old?
Is it dangerous or something? I know we're a bit behind on repairs, but—
N-no! I'm not here to do repairs! I just want to look around!
I'm sorry. I'm very confused.
It's... Look, I'm trying to tell you... Oh, for heaven's sake!
This castle is of the utmost academic importance!
It's squandered serving as mere shelter for unlearned neophytes like you!
I doubt there is a single qualified scholar among your numbers.
Luckily for you I, the great Althemia, came along. You should be grateful I'm here to study this castle for you!
...Yikes.
Oh...
I...I didn't... I didn't mean it that way... I'm...
Let me see if I understand you correctly. You want to research this castle, yes?
Uh... Y-yes, that... That's right.
I see. Well, you could have just said that from the start.
But yes, that's fine. There's plenty I'd like to learn about it, so having someone dedicated to research would be helpful.
You mean... It's okay? Even after how I  spoke to you...?
Well, it WAS a bit hard to parse what you  were after at first.
N-no, I mean... The horrible things I said. I know I must have offended you.
Oh, I've heard worse.
In any case, welcome to the castle, Althemia. We're happy to have you.
I...um... It's m-my pleasure...
Hey, it's Althemia!
How are your studies of the castle progressing?
U-um...
Found anything interesting yet?
All I can see are borin' old stone walls.
Wh-what do I do, what do I do? S-say something!
Huh? Speak up there. I can't hear ya.
Oh! Um... I-interesting, you say?
Take this wall, for example. It's just one of many saturated with fascinating history!
Like these scrawled runes here!
I'm sure you know just by looking, but these inscriptions are mixed with the arcane techniques of a strange civilization—
This ain't just some fancy decoration?
Not at all! These are vestiges of ancient magic. You live here—you ought to take more interest in such things!
R-right...
Um...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to say that. That was very rude.
Hmm... You're right, Althemia.
We've never really appreciated our home like we should.
What...?
I have a favor to ask.
Would you mind teaching me all there is to know about this castle?
I... That... Um...
W-well, if I must.
But it will take me until the morning to explain everything to you, and I won't abide any complaints!
I'm happy to listen for as long as it takes.
All NIGHT?!
I, uh... I just remembered, there's this thing I gotta do. Somewhere else.
Right. The first thing you need to know about this castle is...
...And there you have it!
Ahh, I'm so happy I found this castle!
Oh, but I've been rambling on and on!
Y-you must've been so bored. I'm sorry...
Hmm... That was really enlightening.
Thank you for taking the time to teach me all of that, Althemia.
What...?
There was a lot I didn't understand, but I know much more about this castle now than I did before.
Please let me know whenever you discover something new.
I, um... Sure.
Thank you...for listening to me.
And for teaching me something. Heh...
Phew... I'm not sure how we managed that, but we did.
*sniff* No thanks to me... I was totally useless in that fight...
I studied so much about that fiend, and it still got the best of me.
Althemia, what was it that prevented you from coming to my aid when I asked?
Uh. That I... Well...
Th-the characteristic of that fiend is...um... That fiend, its weakness is... *sniff*
What is it? Do not mince words.
*sniff*
I-if I knew...how to do that...I would. Don't you think I'd have already explained?
S-sorry I can't just spit it out! Excuuuse me!
Not everyone can be as perfect as you!
Althemia, wait! ...What's come over her?
I did it again...
Why can't I just say what I want to say...?
There you are, Althemia.
Euden...
C-come to laugh at me?
No. Why would I—
I am laughable, aren't I?
I can jabber on about the most useless trivia, but when it comes down to anything important, I can't string words together.
No wonder Elisanne is frustrated with me.
I know you poke fun behind my back.
Don't try to deny it.
I know everyone hates me!
And I...I can't blame you...
Even I can't stand myself...
I'd never make fun of you, Althemia.
All I came to do was talk to you.
You were trying to explain something to Elisanne earlier, right?
You...you could tell?
The...the truth is, I...thought of a good way to...to defeat the fiends.
I, um...figured it out from studying them.
But since I...I can't really explain it right, I just... I couldn't tell her, so...
Althemia.
Elisanne...? W-were you listening this whole time?
Allow me to apologize for earlier.
The way I phrased my question was incredibly rude. I understand why you struggled to form a response.
E-exactly! You should be asha— No, wait! I mean...
I'm sorry, too.
This...the way I am...isn't working. I have to change...
Because Euden and Elisanne are so nice to me... I have to!
Don't let all these fiends surround you!
T-today's the day... My research is finally going to pay off for everyone!
They may have greater numbers, but they aren't that strong!
Just stay calm and deal with them one at a time!
N-no! Th-these fiends are... They...they...
Why? Why can't I...when it matters most... Why do my words fail me?!
Althemia! Do you have any ideas?
Now's the time to tell me if you do! I can't read these fiends at all.
I could really use your wisdom!
B-but I... I don't know if...I can explain...
I know you can! You told me all about the castle the other day, didn't you?
Those fiends... They...
The cries they make... It's their way of communicating, so we...we can't just go after them at random.
They're working in tandem?
That's why we can't read their movements when we face them one-on-one?
Y-yeah... But it's j-just some of them, leading the whole pack... They give the orders, and the...the others follow.
I...I can figure out which...which ones they are.
S-so everyone needs to drive them into one spot...
Then the rest of the fiends will gather together, and...
And I can hit them with my magic all at once...
All right.
Everyone, we need to chase the fiends Althemia points out up to that high ground!
Okay, we've got 'em all right where we want 'em!
Incredible... Althemia was right! The rest of them followed the leaders.
Althemia—now!
Take this!
Graaaagghhhhh!
Whoa!
What'd ya do, Althemia? They're paralyzed!
I-I used sonic magic to numb their semicircular canals, since they're sensitive to sound... Uh, but that doesn't matter right now! Attack them before it wears off!
Thank you, Althemia.
With your strategy, we were able to defeat those fiends without sustaining injuries.
Never have I fought such an easy battle.
I am truly grateful.
Th-that's nothing to be impressed by!
You sound ridiculous, making it out to be such a big deal!
Er, did I say something insensitive again?
No, I don't think so... I think she's just flustered.
I'm doing it again!
Why? She was complimenting me! Stupid, stupid, stupid!
Ah—there you are, Euden!
You're absolutely beaming, Althemia. Did something good happen?
Yes! I'm finally seeing results from the research I've conducted on this castle!
Please don't tell me that means ya got another all-night lecture in store.
I can't wait for you to tell me everything you learned.
Then wait no more! Listen to this!
This castle contains way more mana than normal. That means...
...And thusly, things that have arcane patterns woven in them might also be related to the mana levels!
Does anyone actually understand any'a this gibberish?
I'm afraid it's far too technical for me.
She's clearly trying to communicate something to us, though.
...Wh-what's wrong? Are you...bored?
Not at all. There are just a great number of unfamiliar terms.
Hmph! Your confusion is written all over your faces! I...I mean...
T-try to put it in a way they'll understand... Think about it from their perspective... Easy words...
Wh-what part are you having trouble with?
J-just tell me and I'll do my best to explain.
I had to explain every little thing! That took forever!
It was time well spent. Now we all know a little more about this castle.
Thank you, Althemia.
R-really...?
Um... Euden?
I...I've pretty much researched all I can about the castle, so I was wondering...
Would...would you let me study your shapeshifting? I mean, if you have time!
I would think you'd want to take a break after finishing a big research project, not leap right into another one.
Your passion for knowledge never ceases to amaze me.
I just...want to know more about you.
You do?
N-not you, per se, but your abilities! How you turn into a dragon?
Well... Sure, I don't mind.
You can study me to your heart's content.
Oh, that's... That's good.
Well, who wouldn't want to be the subject of my research? You'd have to be a fool to refuse.
I mean... Um...
Thank you, Euden. I...I really appreciate it.
Appreciate what?
All I did was say you could research me.
It's not just that. It's... Oh, never mind!
In any case, I'd like to begin my research, so come with me!
This is going to take some time, I'm afraid.
You're going to be stuck with me for a while, Euden!
